Class MaxHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
MaxHeap<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements in this max heap
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MaxHeap<E>>, java.lang.Iterable<E>
public class MaxHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.lang.Comparable<MaxHeap<E>>
Class that represents a max heap.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this max heap. The string representation consists of a list of the max heap's elements in decreasing order. Adjacent elements are separated by the character " " (space). Elements are converted to strings as by their toString() methods.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of this max heap

    • treeStructure

      public java.lang.String treeStructure()
      Returns a tree representation of this max heap. Child elements are represent with a new line and additional whitespace.
      Returns:
      a tree representation of this max heap
